page_1.title: Zoe's Cosmic Adventure
page_1.story_overview: Zoe, a curious little girl with a sparkling imagination, discovers a magical book that transports her to a colorful planet filled with friendly aliens. They explore vibrant landscapes, dance with glowing stars, and learn about sharing and cooperation. Together, they face a challenge, using their unique abilities to solve it. In the end, Zoe returns home, wiser and ready to share her new knowledge with her friends.

character.name: Zoe
character.description: Zoe is a lively 6-year-old girl with big, bright eyes and curly hair. She wears a sparkly space helmet and a rainbow tutu, reflecting her imaginative spirit.
